content: lamby by tanis gray for cascade yarns materials 2 skeins cascade yarns pluscious 3 5oz/100g ea approx 149yds/136m 100% polyester in #17 mint size us 9 5 5 mm 24 circular knitting needles size us 9 5 5 mm dpns stitch marker tapestry needle 2 ½ safety eyes 1 ½ safety nose polyfil stuffing gauge gauge is not important for this project approximate finished size 23 high instructions body using circular knitting needle co 40 sts do not join into round body is worked back and forth in row from bottom up work in garter st knit every row until work measures 12 from co edge next row *k2tog* to end of row 20 sts next row k2 *k2tog* to last 2 sts k2 12 sts head divide 12 body sts evenly over dpns pm for beginning of round k12 next round *kfb* to end of round 24 sts next round k24 next round *kfb* to end of round 48 sts work in garter st for 20 rounds next round *k2tog* to end of round 24 sts next round k24 next round *k2tog* to end of round 12 sts next round *k2tog* to end of round 6 sts break yarn leaving long tail weave tail through rem sts and cinch shut secure on ws right leg with dpns pick up and knit 12 sts on lower right edge of body work in garter st for 1 © 2013 tanis gray www tanisknits com page one lamby by tanis gray for cascade yarns next row ssk twice k4 k2tog twice 8 sts next row ssk twice k2tog twice 4 sts bobble rem sts left leg with dpns pick up and knit 12 sts on lower left edge of body continue as for right leg tail with dpns find back center bottom of body pick up and knit 6 sts vertically 1 from bottom edge work in garter st for 1 next row ssk k2 k2tog 4 sts next row ssk k2tog 2 sts bobble rem sts arms make 2 alike with dpns pick up and knit 8 sts at body edge directly under head work in garter for 25 row next row ssk twice k2tog twice 4 sts next row ssk k2tog 2 sts bobble rem sts repeat for other side ears make 2 alike with dpns co 10 sts work in garter st for 18 row next row ssk twice k2 k2tog twice 6 sts next row ssk k2 k2tog 4 sts next row k4 next row ssk k2tog 2 sts next row k2 bobble rem sts fold ear in half lengthwise and attach to head where desired repeat for other side finishing attach safety eyes and safety nose to desired spot on face stuff head with polyfil being careful not to overstuff with 12 piece of yarn and tapestry needle stitch bottom of head closed to retain polyfil weave in all loose ends with tapestry needle © 2013 tanis gray www tanisknits com page two
